snippet.title: Train Sim World 4 Official Trailer
snippet.description:
New locomotives, new routes, new operators, new features, new music, new options, and even a new country. 

Train Sim World 4 has arrived!

The new routes/locos in the Standard Edition:
S-Bahn Vorarlberg: Lindau - Bludenz
Antelope Valley Line: Los Angeles – Lancaster
East Coast Main Line: Peterborough – Doncaster
Nahverkehr Dresden – Riesa (Upgraded) 

The extra new routes/locos in the Deluxe and Special Editions:
LNER Class A3 ‘Flying Scotsman’
Railpool BR 193 Vectron

Find out more about the Train Sim World 4 here: https://bit.ly/Train-Sim-World-4-d 

---------------------------------------------------------------
Follow us on our social channels: 
Facebook: https://bit.ly/32c9Jdn
Twitter: https://bit.ly/2TPAfVu
Instagram: https://bit.ly/362LaRx

ESRB Rating: Everyone / PEGI: 3 

#trainsimworld
